item.title: A comic book tutorial for Fate Core
item.description: If you play Fate Core, here is a short summary of the rules as a one-sheet comic book: Also available as a high-resolution pdf. This tutorial was initially developed as part of Ronin Time Bureaucrats. Credit for the idea of a Fate Core summary of rules goes to Up to 4 players.
